column4: I cannot write to external usb drive i do not have permission. All that has changed on my system is that i have added a new user. I have tried creating a user group and chown the mount piont, but no joy, please help
can't write or can't mount? if you can't write, make sure you are a UID that coincides with the permissions on your drive
I can mount it and read it, but i cant write to it, its only changed since i added a new user account
I can mount and read, its only been a problem since i added a new user account
